about_the_game:
This collection includes music tracks inspired by six different town environments and a battle music track!

Contents

 ogg
 m4a


Total of 7 tracks: 6 Town BGM tracks, and 1 Battle BGM track.
Town BGM
1.Town_Desert Town
A lively tune that captures the atmosphere of a town in the desert.
2.Town_Forest Town
A melody that evokes the image of a town nestled in the forest.
3. Town_Highlands Town
A tune that brings to mind a town situated on the highlands.
4. Town_prairie Town
A composition that embodies a town located in the grassy plains.
5.Town_Snowy Town
A piece that paints a picture of a cold town covered in snow.
6.Town_Town in the Wilderness
A melody that conjures up the image of a town in the wilderness.

BGM for battle
1. Battle
A track for intense battles.

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
